cancR 1.0.0

Generate all possible cominations/permutations

combinR.Rd

All possible combinations of a single vector (ABC: ABC, ACB, BAC, BCA, CAB, CBA) or two separate vectors (AB, CD: ABCD, CDAB) The function does not allow for replacements.

Usage

combinR(letters, letters2 = NULL, list = F)

Arguments

letters

Vector either of length 1 (will be split for each subelement) og length >1

letters2

Optional second vector if chunks are to be combined

list

Whether all combinations should be returned as a list (useful for looping with lapply)

Value

Returns all possible combinations of the input vector(s)
